docs.title: mercati_energetici.MercatiAmbientali
docs.text:
Bases: MercatiEnergetici

Environmental market low level API wrapper. See: https://www.mercatoelettrico.org/En/Mercati/TEE/CosaSonoTee.aspx for an explanation of the markets.

docs.title: get_markets() async
docs.text:
Get environmental markets.

Returns:

Type Description list[dict]

A list of Python dictionaries like: [{"data": 20230323, "mercato": "GO", "volumi": 136917 }]

docs.title: get_trading_results(market, day=None) async
docs.text:
Get environmental market results.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default market str

The market to get results from.

required day date | str

Date of the market. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None

Returns:

Type Description list[dict]

A list of Python dictionaries like: [{"data": 20230323, "mercato": "GO", "tipologia": "Altro", "periodo": "Altri Mesi 2022", "prezzoRiferimento": 6.833425, "prezzoMinimo": 6.1, "prezzoMassimo": 9, "volumi": 3115 },]

docs.title: mercati_energetici.MercatiElettrici
docs.text:
Bases: MercatiEnergetici

Electricity Markets low level API wrapper. See: https://www.mercatoelettrico.org/En/Mercati/MercatoElettrico/IlMercatoElettrico.aspx for an explanation of the markets.

docs.title: get_markets() async
docs.text:
Get electricity markets.

Returns:

Type Description dict

A list of Python dictionaries like: [{data: ..., mercato: ..., volumi: ...}]

docs.title: get_prices(market, day=None) async
docs.text:
Get electricity prices in €/MWh for a specific day on all the market zones.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default market str

The market to get prices from.

required day date | str

Get prices of this date. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None

Returns:

Type Description list[dict]

A Python dictionary like: [{"data": 20230323, "ora": 1, "mercato": "MGP", "zona": "CALA", "prezzo": 128.69 },]

docs.title: get_volumes(market, day=None) async
docs.text:
Get bought and sold volume for a specific day on all the market zones.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default market str

The market to get volumes from.

required day date | str

Get volumes of this date. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None

Returns:

Type Description list[dict]

A Python dictionary like: [{ "data": 20230323, "ora": 1, "mercato": "MGP", "zona": "CALA", "acquisti": 482.198, "vendite": 1001.576 },]

docs.title: get_liquidity(day=None) async
docs.text:
Get liquidity of electricity markets.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default day date | str

Get liquidity of this date. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None

Returns:

Type Description dict

A Python dictionary like: [{"data": 20230323, "ora": 1, "liquidita": 74.4741952239522 },]

docs.title: mercati_energetici.energy_markets.MercatiEnergetici dataclass
docs.text: Base class for handling connections with the GME APP API.

docs.title: get_general_conditions(language='EN') async
docs.text:
Get general usage conditions.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default language str

'EN' or 'IT'

'EN'

Returns:

Type Description dict

A Python dictionary like: {id: ..., lingua: ..., testo: ..., ultimoAggiornamento: ..., tipo: 'CG'}

docs.title: get_disclaimer(language='EN') async
docs.text:
Get disclaimer.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default language str

'EN' or 'IT'

'EN'

Returns:

Type Description dict

A Python dictionary like: {id: ..., lingua: ..., testo: ..., ultimoAggiornamento: ..., tipo: 'DI'}

docs.title: close() async
docs.text: Close client session.

docs.title: mercati_energetici.MercatiGas
docs.text:
Bases: MercatiEnergetici

Gas markets low level API wrapper. See: https://www.mercatoelettrico.org/en/Mercati/MGAS/MGas.aspx for an explanation of the markets.

docs.title: get_markets() async
docs.text:
Get gas markets.

Returns:

Type Description list[dict]

A list of Python dictionaries like: [{data: ..., mercato: ..., volumi: ..., tipo: ...}]

docs.title: get_continuous_trading_results(product, day=None) async
docs.text:
Get gas market results on the continuous trading mode.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default product str

the market-day to get results from

required day date | str

Date of the market negotiation. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None

Returns:

Type Description list[dict]

A list of Python dictionaries like: [{ "data": 20230322, "mercato": "MGP", "prodotto": "MGP-2023-03-23", "primoPrezzo": 45, "ultimoPrezzo": 43.85, "prezzoMinimo": 43.75, "prezzoMassimo": 45.5, "prezzoMedio": 44.430046, "prezzoControllo": 44.638, "volumiMw": 11112, "volumiMwh": 266688 }]

docs.title: get_auction_trading_results(product, day=None) async
docs.text:
Get gas market results on the auction mode.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default product str

the market-day to get results from.

required day date | str

Date of the market negotiations. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None

Returns:

Type Description list[dict]

A list of Python dictionaries like: [{"data": 20230323, "mercato": "MGP", "prodotto": "MGP-2023-03-24", "prezzo": 45.351, "volumiMw": 9124, "volumiMwh": 218976, "acquistiTso": 0, "venditeTso": 218976 }]

docs.title: get_stored_gas_trading_results(company, day=None) async
docs.text:
Get gas market results for the stored gas.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default company str

the market-company to get results from.

required day date | str

Date of the market negotiations. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None

Returns:

Type Description list[dict]

A list of Python dictionaries like: [{"data": 20230322, "dataFlusso": 20230322, "impresaStoccaggio": "Stogit", "tipologia": null, "prezzo": 43.5, "volumi": 16613.903, "acquistiSrg": 6237.903, "venditeSrg": 0 }]

docs.title: mercati_energetici.MGP
docs.text:
Bases: MercatiElettrici

Day-ahead Electricity Market. This is a higher level interface over MercatiElettrici for the MGP market and the PUN price. Hours are in [0 -> 23].

docs.title: get_prices(day=None, zone='PUN') async
docs.text:
Get electricity prices in €/MWh for a specific day and zone.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default day date | str

Get prices of this date. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None zone str

One of ["CALA","CNOR","CSUD","NORD","PUN","SARD","SICI","SUD"]. Default is "PUN" (whole Italy).

'PUN'

Returns:

Type Description dict

A Python dictionary like: { hour : price_per_MWh }

docs.title: daily_pun(day=None) async
docs.text:
Get the PUN price for a specific day.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default day date | str

Get prices of this date. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None

Returns:

Type Description float

The PUN price in €/MWh.

docs.title: get_volumes(day=None, zone='Totale') async
docs.text:
Get bought and sold volume for a specific day and zone.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default day date | str

Get volumes of this date. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None zone str

One of ["CALA","CNOR","CSUD","NORD","SARD","SICI","SUD","Totale"]. Default is "Totale" (whole Italy).

'Totale'

Returns:

Type Description tuple[dict, dict]

Two Python dictionaries like: { hour : MWh }

docs.title: get_liquidity(day=None) async
docs.text:
Get liquidity of electricity markets.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default day date | str

Get liquidity of this date. Default is today. A string in the format "YYYYMMDD" or a datetime.date object.

None

Returns:

Type Description dict

A Python dictionary like: {hour: liquidity}.
